scripts.build: npm run build:projectA && npm run build:projectB
scripts.build:projectA: vite build --outDir dist/projectA --emptyOutDir && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectA index dist/projectA && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectA index-rtl dist/projectA && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectA index-pim dist/projectA
scripts.build:projectB: vite build --outDir dist/projectB --emptyOutDir && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectB index dist/projectB && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectB index-rtl dist/projectB && node build-utils/project-builder.js projectB index-pim dist/projectB
